description: This file defines a React functional component that renders the application's navigation bar, including brand logo, search input, user authentication actions, and cart indicator. It manages state synchronization with URL parameters and local storage, and includes sub-components for user actions.

methods.name: AuthActions
methods.description: Component handling user authentication state: displays profile info and logout button if logged in, or sign in/register links if logged out.

methods.name: Navbar
methods.description: Main component implementing the top navigation bar with logo, search, cart indicator, and user actions.
